# MTKModelIOVertexFormatFromMetal(_:)

**Function**

Returns a converted Model I/O vertex format.

## Declaration

```swift
func MTKModelIOVertexFormatFromMetal(_ vertexFormat: MTLVertexFormat) -> MDLVertexFormat
```

## Parameters

- **vertexFormat**: A Metal vertex format to convert from.

## Return Value

A Model I/O vertex format value.

## Discussion

This function returns [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ModelIO/MDLVertexFormat/invalid] if no matching [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ModelIO/MDLVertexFormat] exists.

## Converting Between Model I/O and Metal Vertex Formats

- **MTKMetalVertexFormatFromModelIO(_:)**: Returns a converted Metal vertex format.
